titleStmt.title: The firste parte of Churchyardes chippes contayning twelue seuerall labours. Deuised and published, only by Thomas Churchyard Gentilman.
titleStmt.author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestreate neare vnto Saint Dunstones Church by Thomas Marshe,

notesStmt.note: "Quires E-F, K-O are possibly by another pr[inter]. or compositor"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
